text: Pierre Volla (born 16 July 1981) is a French Olympic dressage rider. Representing France, he competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro where he finished 31st in the individual and 8th in the team competition. Volla also competed at the 2015 European Dressage Championships where he placed 6th in the team and 18th in the individual competition. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:French male equestrians Category:French dressage riders Category:Equestrians at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic equestrians of France
title: Pierre Volla
